name: Project Uprising
description:
You play as a mysterious stranger who is ready to sacrifice everything to end the suppression and injustice of the android population. Shoot your way through the evil mega corporations’ headquarters and reach the top of the skyscraper to start the revolution.   

As you make your ascent up this giant tower you will be faced with difficult platforming and powerful enemies. With the right momentum and skillful maneuvering, you should make short work of the evil forces. Seems Impossible? Not for you. 

Will you be the salvation the android uprising has been waiting for?
